text: A 39-year old man, P. Joseph of Ottyalvilai in Arumanai near Marthandam, was arrested on Thursday on a charge of sexually harassing his 10-year old daughter. On the basis of a complaint lodged by his daughter, Joseph was arrested by the Marthandam All Women Police. A case under Sections 9 (b) and 10 of Protection of Children from Sexual Offences (POSCO) Act, 2012, has been registered against him. Joseph was produced before the Mahila Court in Nagercoil and was remanded in judicial custody, police sources said.
title: Sexual abuse: man held
